diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AD$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $AC$ is $x$ units.
The measure of angle $BCA$ is $43$ degrees.
The length of the line $BD$ is $y$ units.
Point $A$ lies on the line connecting $C$ and $D$.
The line $AC$ is perpendicular to the line $AB$.
The line $BD$ is perpendicular to the line $BC$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AD$, forming a right triangle $ABC$.
There are lines $BC$, $BD$, $CD$, forming a right triangle $BCD$.
